summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 10829, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the licensing of persons, firms and corporations engaged in hauling garbage in the City of Seattle, the use of a metal plat by such persons, firm or corporations engaged in such work, and providing penalties for violation and repealing Ordinance No. 9478, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the for the licensing of those hauling garbage in the City of Seattle, and the use of a metal plat by persons engaged in such work, and providing penalties for violation thereof", approved April 8, 1903", approved May 7, 1904.
